name: Pumpkin Farm (Lardonzaurus)
description:
Pumpkin Farm was made for the Cozy Autumn Jam 2022 by Firith Studio!

Made by Qedrinad & Lardonzaurus.
The game was made during our free time in the span of two days. It was a great learning experience and it was a good opportunity to rediscover Unity!

Please play in full screen for a better experience!

Sounds by :
Background music - Matthew Pablo
Chewing sound - InspectorJ
Snapping sound - InspectorJ
Coins sound - Anthousai
